name: Serpent Spine
effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {0}% more DMG and take {1}% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
